amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 116-42 to include findings recognizing that American cities, States, and businesses are stepping up and pledging to meet the Paris Agreement goals in the wake of absent and uncertain United States Federal leadership.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Rouda.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
